name: Invoked
description: On hit, if target foe is defeated this phase, create a phantom unit in target foe's space (without @{condition}{Sickness}). The type of the created unit is determined by the @{const}{conjure}{“Conjure”} attribute on the host, and defaults to a @{class}{Lemure} if none is present.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
